response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I believe it's only fair to share this opportunity with you first. I am offering the product to you at a special price of $11,000, which I believe is a fair compromise between its worth and your valuation. I trust that you will appreciate its quality and make the most out of it. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
